title: Liam Payne on his relationship with the One Direction boys and confronting Justin Bieber
text:

Liam Payne has spoken about his relationship with the rest of the One Direction boys and about the time he confronted Justin Bieber in his trailer.

The singer, 26, revealed the only other former member he still regularly speaks to is Louis Tomlinson , who he has supported after a particularly tragic year for him.

Louis' mother Johannah died in December 2016 after a year-long battle with leukemia, and his sister Félicité died in March this year from a heart attack after a drug overdose.

Speaking exclusively to MirrorOnline, Liam said: "I speak to Louis all the time, Louis is great. He's doing really well.

"We've always had a good connection in the way that we were both trying to manage the band together.

(Image: Brian J Ritchie/Hotsauce/REX)

(Image: Instagram)

"And that's followed into life, and obviously he has been through a hell of a lot.

"So I've tried to be there for him as much as possible, and so does he me."

The pair are both dads to young children too - Liam shares two-year-old Bear with ex Cheryl , and Louis has three-year-old Freddie with his ex Briana Jungwirth, a former stylist.

(Image: Brian J Ritchie/Hotsauce/REX)

(Image: Splash)

But Liam has previously confessed that at the start of the band's career, he "absolutely hated" Louis, and they endured a power struggle where they both wanted to "be the leader".

Liam explained that dealing with the pressure that comes with immense fame being thrust upon you was made easier at the time by his band mates.

"There were five of us that knew how each other were feeling. It's harder by yourself", he said.

He compared this to Justin Bieber, 25, who shot to international stardom on his own at age 13.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

One Direction and Bieber famously had an ongoing feud that kicked off in 2015, and Liam revealed he put the fight to bed after confronting Justin about it.

"Me and Justin had a really long chat once in his trailer", he said.

"There had been 1D and Justin Bieber beef at the time.

(Image: Instagram)

"I went in to say to him: 'It's all good. You don't need to do whatever'.

"And then we had a really long chat, and he's a really nice kid."

Liam said there was "definitely" competition between him and the other 1D members as they battle it out in the charts with their solo material.

But he confessed he rates his song writing ability, adding that he wrote half of all of One Direction's albums, which has helped him in writing his own songs.

(Image: 2014 Getty Images)

(Image: ITV)

Liam also appeared on The Jonathan Ross Show on ITV last night, where he devastated hardcore 1D fans by saying a reunion was unlikely to happen soon - especially one involving Zayn Malik, who he said left on bad terms.

Talking about his relationship with the rest of the former members, he said: “I speak to Niall [Horan] every so often.

"I haven’t spoken to Harry [Styles] in a long time now.

(Image: Getty Images)

"Zayn left so I haven’t seen him since then… I always feel like Zayn didn’t really feel being there, if that makes sense.

"We all had a good time, there were moments when it was absolute bliss but then obviously there were moments where it was like, ‘This is awful.’

"For him I just think there were more moments where he didn’t really enjoy what he was doing. Fair play to him, he went off and did his own thing and he’s doing really well.”
description: EXCLUSIVE: Liam Payne spoke exclusively to MirrorOnline about looking after grieving Louis Tomlinson, and the time he confronted Justin Bieber about their feud
